name: Toggle list
description: Displays a list of items where each can be individually toggled on or off. Ideal for managing settings like alarms, notifications, or app permissions.
examples: Turn on notifications for new emails, but turn them off for social media.
Show me the app permission list.

component_title.description: A brief summary of the information or content defined in each layout, expressed as a short word or phrase rather than a full sentence. Example: For a user query 'Show me the way from Gangnam Station to Pangyo Station and my schedule for today,' the title could be 'Route and Schedule.'

toggle_list.description: A list of items that can be toggled. Used to list multiple items of the same type, with a minimum of one and a maximum of five items. The divider for the last item is hidden.

list_subject.description: A single line of text, with a maximum width of 150 and a limit of 20 characters. Content exceeding the character limit will be truncated with an ellipsis (...).

list_toggle.description: The on/off state of the item.
